ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cphsubrglem.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 2 |  | cphsubrglem.1 | |- ( ph -> F = ( CCfld |`s A ) ) |
| 3 |  | cphsubrglem.2 | |- ( ph -> F e. DivRing ) |

| 5 | 4 | #P_simp3d | |- ( ph -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_subrgss | |- ( K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> K C_ CC ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> K C_ CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> X e. K ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> X e. CC ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> X =/= 0 ) |
| 13 |  | #P_cnfldinv | |- ( ( X e. CC /\ X =/= 0 ) -> ( ( invr ` CCfld ) ` X ) = ( 1 / X ) ) |

| 16 |  | #P_cnfld0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |

| 18 | 6, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> 0 = ( 0g ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 19 | 4 | #P_simp1d | |- ( ph -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |

| 23 | 12, 22 | #P_neeqtrd | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> X =/= ( 0g ` F ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_eldifsn | |- ( X e. ( K \ { ( 0g ` F ) } ) <-> ( X e. K /\ X =/= ( 0g ` F ) ) ) |
| 25 | 10, 23, 24 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> X e. ( K \ { ( 0g ` F ) } ) ) |
| 26 | 3 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> F e. DivRing ) |
| 27 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` F ) = ( Unit ` F ) |
| 28 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` F ) = ( 0g ` F ) |

| 30 | 29 | #P_simprbi | |- ( F e. DivRing -> ( Unit ` F ) = ( K \ { ( 0g ` F ) } ) ) |
| 31 | 26, 30 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> ( Unit ` F ) = ( K \ { ( 0g ` F ) } ) ) |
| 32 | 20 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> ( Unit ` F ) = ( Unit ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |

| 34 | 25, 33 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> X e. ( Unit ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 35 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` CCfld ) = ( Unit ` CCfld ) |
| 36 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) = ( Unit ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 37 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invr ` CCfld ) = ( invr ` CCfld ) |
| 38 | 15, 35, 36, 37 | #P_subrgunit | |- ( K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> ( X e. ( Unit ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) <-> ( X e. ( Unit ` CCfld ) /\ X e. K /\ ( ( invr ` CCfld ) ` X ) e. K ) ) ) |

| 42 | 14, 41 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K /\ X =/= 0 ) -> ( 1 / X ) e. K ) |
